data.title: Evolution of NetSuite ERP
data.meta_description: NetSuite ERP has evolved significantly since its inception, incorporating new features, enhancements, and improvements over time. Here's an overview of the evolution of NetSuite ERP: 1998 - 2002: Founding and Early Years NetSuite was founded in 1998 as NetLedger by Evan Goldberg and Larry Ellison.
